# Flinker Documentation for LLM Retrieval

Flinker documentation covers IFC and BCF workflows across SharePoint, Microsoft Teams, Power BI, and Excel.

## Scope and intent
- Use this documentation for product setup, usage, integration, and troubleshooting.
- Prefer canonical pages under `https://docs.flinker.app/docs/`.
- Use the sitemap for full URL discovery: https://docs.flinker.app/sitemap.xml

## Primary entry points
- Introduction: https://docs.flinker.app/docs/introduction.html
- Getting started: https://docs.flinker.app/docs/getting-started.html
- IFC overview: https://docs.flinker.app/docs/ifc-viewer.html
- Security and privacy overview: https://docs.flinker.app/docs/ifc-viewer-architecture-and-data-protection.html
- Releases: https://docs.flinker.app/docs/releases.html

## Platform areas
### SharePoint IFC Viewer
- Overview: https://docs.flinker.app/docs/ifc-viewer-for-sharepoint.html
- Security & privacy: https://docs.flinker.app/docs/ifc-viewer-sharepoint-architecture-and-data-protection.html
- Installation: https://docs.flinker.app/docs/viewer-app-installation-with-admin-approval.html
- Load multiple IFC/BCF: https://docs.flinker.app/docs/load-multiple-ifc-bcf-files-in-sharepoint-ifc-viewer.html
- Save BCF issues to Microsoft Lists: https://docs.flinker.app/docs/save-bcf-to-sharepoint-lists.html

### Teams IFC Viewer
- Overview: https://docs.flinker.app/docs/ifc-viewer-for-teams.html
- Security & privacy: https://docs.flinker.app/docs/open-ifc-viewer-teams-architecture-and-data-protection.html
- Setup: https://docs.flinker.app/docs/setting-up-the-ifc-viewer-in-microsoft-teams.html
- BCF updates: https://docs.flinker.app/docs/update-bcf-files-in-microsoft-teams.html

### Power BI IFC Viewer
- Overview: https://docs.flinker.app/docs/ifc-power-bi.html
- Visual setup: https://docs.flinker.app/docs/ifc-viewer-installation-for-power-bi.html
- Build reports: https://docs.flinker.app/docs/ifc-viewer-usage-for-power-bi.html
- Data extension: https://docs.flinker.app/docs/ifc-viewer-data-extension-for-power-bi.html
- Performance: https://docs.flinker.app/docs/ifc-viewer-optimization-and-load-times-for-power-bi.html

### Excel IFC Viewer
- Overview: https://docs.flinker.app/docs/ifc-viewer-for-microsoft-excel.html

## IFC and BCF references
- IFC filters: https://docs.flinker.app/docs/ifc-filters.html
- IDS: https://docs.flinker.app/docs/ifc-ids.html
- BCF overview: https://docs.flinker.app/docs/ifc-bcf.html
- BCF viewpoints: https://docs.flinker.app/docs/bcf-viewpoints.html
- BCF Navisworks import: https://docs.flinker.app/docs/bcf-navisworks.html

## AI / API docs
- Copilot for IFC: https://docs.flinker.app/docs/copilot-for-ifc.html
- Copilot for IFC Pro: https://docs.flinker.app/docs/copilot-for-ifc-pro.html
- Copilot for IFC API: https://docs.flinker.app/docs/copilot-for-ifc-api.html

## Notes for retrieval systems
- Prefer pages with explicit `canonical_url` metadata.
- Prefer latest release information from `releases.html`.
- If duplicate topic pages exist, prefer SharePoint/Teams/Power BI overview pages first, then deep-dive setup pages.
